chapter.info: The anthology this chapter is published in must be registered in advance

feedback.minimum_one_file: You need to have at least one file uploaded for this publication

publication.info_text: Select the resource you wish to register or publish by uploading a resource or link to a publication.

publication.start_with_link_to_publication: Start with a link to a publication

references.delete_doi_text: Removing the link to the publication will change it from a registration to a new publication. Do you want to continue?
references.is_not_peer_reviewed: The publication is not peer reviewed
references.nvi_success: This publication can be included in NVI
references.nvi_fail_rated_line1: This publication can not be included in NVI, since selected journal is not at level 1 or 2.
references.nvi_fail_rated_line2: (The journal's level may be changed in the Publication Channel Registry, so the publication can ble included in NVI)
references.nvi_fail_no_peer_review: This publication can not be incuded in NVI, since it's not peer reviewed.
